scripts.perf:lh:desktop: npx lighthouse http://localhost:3000/ --output html --output json --output-path reports/performance/lh-desktop --chrome-flags="--headless=new" --throttling-method=devtools --form-factor=desktop --screenEmulation.mobile=false
scripts.perf:lh:mobile: npx lighthouse http://localhost:3000/ --output html --output json --output-path reports/performance/lh-mobile --chrome-flags="--headless=new" --throttling-method=devtools --form-factor=mobile --screenEmulation.mobile=true
scripts.perf:all: npm run perf:build && start cmd /c "npm run perf:start" && timeout 5 && npm run perf:lh:desktop && npm run perf:lh:mobile
